Player History
Injured on 5/8/1971 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1976...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 2/20/1976 (Going to STL: 1B W. Upshaw, C T. Pena Sr.. Going to CHC: P S. Eddy)...
Injured on 4/11/1976 with a Broken Skull, out for 9 weeks...
Injured on 4/2/1980 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...

Hit first career homerun on 6/4/1981, off Dave Goltz (NYM)...
